    org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader  

    • Uses of AbstractMonitoringJob in org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader

      Subclasses of AbstractMonitoringJob in org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.reader 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CardAbsentPingMonitoringJob
      Ping the SE to detect removal thanks to the method AbstractObservableLocalReader.isSePresentPing().
      class  CardPresentMonitoringJob
      This monitoring job polls the SeReader.isSePresent() method to detect SE_INSERTED/SE_REMOVED
      class  SmartInsertionMonitoringJob
      Detect the SE insertion thanks to the method SmartInsertionReader.waitForCardPresent().
      class  SmartRemovalMonitoringJob
      Detect the SE removal thanks to the method SmartRemovalReader.waitForCardAbsentNative().
